title: i havent been on GD in ages, but i saw something that made me nostalgic
body:
does anyone still remember 41noob? by some crazy chance i happened to come across his handle on twitter, and it turns out heâ€™s been spending all his time hitting on e-girls. 

like damn, i thought he was a zen monk or something during all that cordeliagallo drama, but i guess not. did he end up giving in and hitting on her too? cause i missed that.
